rundown: 4-5 L @ Athletics Spencer Strider: 6.2 innings, 3 earned runs, 5 hits, 1 HR, 11 strikeouts Batters: Jurickson Profar (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Ozzie Albies (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Sean Murphy (1 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves fell short in a close game against the Athletics, losing by a single run. Despite a strong performance from Spencer Strider on the mound, who struck out 11 batters, the team could not secure the win. Key highlights include: 1. Jurickson Profar and Ozzie Albies both hit home runs, contributing to the Braves' offensive efforts. 2. Strider's impressive strikeout total showcased his dominance, but he allowed 3 earned runs. 3.
